author: Guardian Staff
title: Highlights from Lady Gaga's halftime performance at the Super Bowl – video
text:
Super Bowl Highlights from Lady Gaga's halftime performance at the Super Bowl – video 
Lady Gaga brought the house down with her high energy performance at the Super Bowl, which started with her jumping off the roof of the stadium after singing This Land is Our Land as red, white and blue drones flew in formation in the sky above her. The rest of the set was similarly impressive as she stormed through hits including Bad Romance, Poker Face and Born This Way. While light on overt criticism of Trump and his policies, her performance was praised as sending a message of inclusion, hope and acceptance. View more sharing options
